cards.name: Cruel Accord
cards.effect: Discard one card from your hand, then your opponent discards two cards from their hand.

cards.name: Cry of Madness
cards.effect: Discard two random cards from your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Debilitating Miasma
cards.effect:
Instacast
^^Up to two target units get -2000 this turn.

cards.name: Enveloped in Darkness
cards.effect:
Instacast
^^Target attacking unit gets -1000 this turn.

cards.name: Omega Magic: Yami
cards.effect:
Instacast
^^Choose one OR if you have two or less Towers remaining you can choose both.
^^ • Target unit gets -1000 this turn.
^^ • Return target unit with cost 3 or less from your discard zone to the field.

cards.name: Poisonous Strike
cards.effect:
Instacast
^^Target attacking or blocking unit gets -2000 this turn, then your opponent discards one card from their hand.

cards.name: Returning Shadows
cards.effect:
Instacast
^^Add target unit from your discard zone to your hand.

cards.name: Soul Transfer
cards.effect: Destroy target unit and, if you do, you can put into play a unit from your discard zone whose cost is lower than the destroyed unit.

cards.name: Delayed Poison
cards.effect:
Equip to target unit.
^^At the start of your next turn - Destroy the equipped Unit.

cards.name: Hidden Laboratory
cards.effect:
Arrive - Place three counters on your Champion if it is 'Hoenna, Immoral Conjurer'
^^Exhaust, sacrifice a Golem unit: Draw one card

cards.name: Philosopher's Stone
cards.effect:
Arrive - Expel all Golem Units from your discard zone, and place one counter on this card for each.
^^Exhaust, remove any number Of counters from this card: Search your deck for a Dark unit with cost equal to the number of counters removed, and put it into play.
^^At the end Of a turn - If this card has no counters, sacrifice it.

cards.name: Acid Monger
cards.effect: Arrive - Destroy target Augment.

cards.name: Amorphagus
cards.effect:
Guardian
^^Ruined - Put into play a Blob unit Token with Guardian (Unit • Argent/1000)

cards.name: Argent Archer
cards.effect: Arrive - Deal 500 to target unit.

cards.name: Argent Egg
cards.effect:
Guardian.
^^This card cannot attack.
^^Ruined - Put into play one Whelp unit Token (Unit • Dragon/Argent/500).

cards.name: Dancer of Time
cards.effect: When this card is targeted by a Spell - You may discard one card: If you do, Expel this card and return it to the field at the end of the turn.

cards.name: Novice Protector
cards.effect: Guardian.

cards.name: Professor Rudy, Magical Engineer
cards.effect: Your Arrive effects trigger twice.

cards.name: Savage Mystic
cards.effect: Once per turn, when you cast a Spell - Deal 1000 to target unit.

cards.name: Secret Project, Aira
cards.effect: Your units adjacent to this card cannot be targeted by Spells or Abilities.

cards.name: Silver Watchwoman
cards.effect:
Arrive - Place two counters on this card.
^^Remove a counter from this card: Choose one.
^^ • This card gains Quickness.
^^ • This card gains Target Attack
^^ • Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to this card this turn.

cards.name: Transfiguration Master
cards.effect: Arrive - Expel target unit, and, if you do, rolla die. If the result is even, the owner of the Expelled unit gets a Hulking Mech unit Token (Unit • Argent/4000). If the result is odd, the owner of the Expelled unit gets a Sulking Mech unit Token (Unit • Argent/ 1000).

cards.name: Turin, the Primal Turtle
cards.effect:
Guardian
^^Arrive - Deal 2000 to up to two target units.

cards.name: Twilight Knight
cards.effect:
Destroyer
^^Arrive - Destroy target unit with Guardian, and, if you do, this card gains Quickness.

cards.name: Ariana's Amulet
cards.effect: Arrive - Draw one card. Sacrifice this card: All Spirits lose all abilities until your next turn.

cards.name: Statue at the Argent Tower
cards.effect:
Arrive - Draw one card.
^^Sacrifice this card: Shuffle up to three target units from your discard zone into your deck.

cards.name: Cryptic Crystal
cards.effect:
If your Spirit isn't Water, this card comes into play Exhausted.
^^Exhaust: Produce 1.
^^Arrive - Look at the top two cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

cards.name: Hallowed Crystal
cards.effect:
If your Spirit isn't Light, this card comes into play Exhausted.
^^Exhaust: Produce 1. Exhaust, pay 1: Target unit with Guardian gets +500 this turn.

cards.name: Nightmare Crystal
cards.effect:
If your Spirit isnt Dark, this card comes into play exhausted.
^^Exhaust: Produce 1.
^^Exhaust: Send the top card of your deck to the discard zone.

cards.name: Wyvern Crystal
cards.effect:
If your Spirit isn't Fire, this card comes into play Exhausted.
^^Exhaust: Produce 1.
^^Arrive - Add target Dragon Unit from your discard zone to your hand, and, if you do, discard one card from your hand.

cards.name: Zephyr Crystal
cards.effect:
If your Spirit isn't Air, this card comes into play Exhausted.
^^Exhaust: Produce 1. Exhaust, pay 2: Destroy target Augment.

cards.name: Yuki, the Lightning Flash
cards.effect:
Target Attack
^^If this card is in your hand, after one of your Towers is destroyed - Put this card into play.

cards.name: G.Z. The Explosion Master  ('GZ')
cards.effect:
Arrive - Place an Explosion Counter on target Tower you own.
^^Exhaust, remove an Explosion Counter from a Tower you own; If it is face-down, flip it face-up.  Deal damage equal to double its defense to target Unit, Destroy that Tower.

cards.name: Ash, the Glacial Sorcerer
cards.effect:
When you play a Water Spell - You can place an Ice Wall counter on target non-destroyed Tower you own. (Towers with Ice Wall counters get +500 defense.  If a tower is destroyed, remove all Ice Wall counters from that Tower)
^^Remove all Ice Wall counters from all Towers you own: Deal damage to target Unit equal to the number of counters removed x500.

cards.name: Shard Research Facility
cards.effect:
Arrive - Place counters on this card equal ta the number of Water units you control.
^^At the end of your turn - Yau may remove one or more counters fram this card: Add target Spell from your discard zone to your hand with cost equal to the number of counters you removed. Then if this card has no counters on it, sacrifice it.
